feed.title: XpressTronics: Wholesale Cell Phone Accessories in Canada

author.name: XpressTronics: Wholesale Cell Phone Accessories in Canada

entry.title: Kingston Digital 32GB DataTraveler 101 G2 USB 2.0 Drive (DT101G2/32GB)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 9.99

KINGSTON DataTraveler 101 G2 - USB 2.0 - 32GB

With DataTraveler 101 G2, budget-conscious users get a combination of useful features, large capacity (up to 32GB), and an easy way to store, carry or transfer data between computers and other devices. DataTraveler 101 G2 features a capless, swivel design. 

"If you are looking for a cheap and reliable solution to store all your important data, photos, and videos, DataTraveler 101 G2 is ideal for you." 

Features:

  • Supports Windows® 8, Windows 7, Vista®, XP & Mac
  • Capless swivel design
Specifications:
  • Capacity: 32GB
  • Convenient: pocket-sized for easy transportability
  • Simple: just plug into a USB port
  • Handy: capless design; no cap to lose
NOTE: Assorted Color, so the color may differ than shown in the picture.
